arts.ttl: Real Madrid protest over disparity in red cards, highlight incidents involving Barcelona, Atletico stars
arts.sum: Real Madrid are once again protesting what they view as unfair refereeing decisions, pointing to what they considers inconsistent criteria when compared with Barcelona and Atlético Madrid, reports MARCA. Real Madrid have been at loggerheads with the refereeing system in Spain since last season and things have escalated this term after the red card shown […] The post Real Madrid protest over disparity in red cards, highlight incidents involving Barcelona, Atletico stars appeared first on Madrid Universal.
